amendment.description: Amendment increases the Administration for Children and Families funding by $2.4 million for the Battered Women's Shelter Program and reduces State Unemployment Insurance and Employment Service Operations funding accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds appropriated in the bill for Children and Families Services Programs by $2,399,000 and to reduce funds appropriated for administrative expenses for State Unemployment Insurance and Employment Service Operations comensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chrysler amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
